entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Onefour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Onefour AAFC 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -27.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -30.0°C
Wind: ESE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23 except minus 12 over western sections.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 23 except minus 12 over western sections. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
